title: ISic020592. ISic020592
body:
Facsimile Images

1ΑΡΧΚΛΕ̄Σ

1: orig. ΑΡΧΚΛΕ̄Σ

Apparatus criticus

Text after Arena (IGASM 3)

English translation

Italian translation

commentary

The name inscribed on the cup is widespread in various parts of the Greek world in the form Ἀρχικλῆς. There is also a potter named Ἀρχεκλῆς in Attica active in the 6th century. The name could indicate the potter as well as the owner of the vessel.

bibliography

  • Arena 1994 73, pl. XX.2 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10000282
  • Lentini 1988 16, fig. 4 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001877
  • 38.0951 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10000796
